attributes.action: Stoppage of television license fees payment to BBC for lack of management.
attributes.additional_details:
The judgement delivered by mr justice Mann on 18th  of July 2018,
The unproffesional manner  BBC handle the police raid of Cliff Richard home in 2014 over a sexual abuse case.
It will be so unfair if innocent citizen who struggle so hard to pay household bill,legal fee, struggling to keep house warm during winter are made to burn the bill incurred by unprofessional practise by BBC.
attributes.background: Following the decision of BBC not to challenge the cliff Richard judgement, means that the organisation agreed to have acted unlawful and nobody had been hold responsible,therefore the hard earn money of struggling citizens should not be wasted on legal fee and pay out for mess committed by BBC
